changes.change: Improved pulse charging animation (initial glitch on device plug-in)
Added a slider to configure the height of the bar
Fixed freezes when opening Control Center with "Always White" style on iOS 11
Forces background to be displayed when background style bar is selected
Uses color instead of blur for the background (to reenable blur, modify the plist file and add isBlurBackgroundEnabled)

Added ability to modify white and black background grayness which is used for the background color by modifying the plist file and adding WhiteBackgroundGrayness or BlackBackgroundGrayness (respectively)
